SEARCH
Package org.efs.timer

Class EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.efs.timer.EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder
Enclosing class:
EfsScheduledExecutor
public static final class EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder extends Object
Builder for constructing EfsDispatcher instance.
EfsScheduledExecutor Properties
Name Type Required? Default Value Description
executor name String Yes NA Unique executor name within JVM. May not be null or an empty string.
thread type ThreadType No DEFAULT_THREAD_TYPE Specifies whether this thread is blocking, spinning, spin+park, or spin+yield.
thread priority int No DEFAULT_EXECUTOR_PRIORITY Each scheduled executor thread is set to this priority. Values must be Thread.MIN_PRIORITY ≤ priority ≤ Thread.MAX_PRIORITY.
spin limit long No DEFAULT_SPIN_LIMIT Each dispatcher thread spins this many times attempting to acquire next runnable agent before parking or yield. Property only used if thread type is spin+park or spin+yield.
park time Duration No DEFAULT_PARK_TIME Each dispatcher thread parks this amount of time before spinning on agent queue again. Property only used if thread type is spin+park.
affinity ThreadAffinityConfig No null Thread affinity for dispatcher subordinate threads. Ignored if dispatcher type is special.

Example Building EfsScheduledExecutor

import java.time.Duration;
import org.efs.timer.EfsScheduledExecutor;

    // EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder automatically stores executor
    // instance in scheduled executor map using its unique name
    // as key and start executor.
    // Therefore it is not required to place executor instance
    // in a local variable since that executor instance can be
    // readily accessed by its name via
    // EfsScheduleExecutor.getExecutor(name).
    (EfsScheduledExecutor.builder()).executorName("FastExecutor")
                                    .threadType(ThreadType.SPINNING)
                                    .priority(Thread.MAX_PRIORITY)
                                    // See ThreadAffinityConfig.
                                    .threadAffinity(sFastAffinity)
                                    .build();
    (EfsScheduledExecutor.builder()).executorName("MediumExecutor")
                                    .threadType(ThreadType.SPINPARK)
                                    .priority(7)
                                    .spinLimit(1_000_000L)
                                    .parkTime(Duration.ofNanos(1_000L)
                                    .build();
    (EfsScheduledExecutor.builder()).executorName("SlowExecutor")
                                    .threadType(ThreadType.BLOCKING)
                                    .priority(Thread.MIN_PRIORITY)
                                    .build();

  • Method Details

    • executorName

      public EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder executorName(String name)
      Sets unique executor name.
      Parameters:
      name - unique executor name.
      Returns:
      this scheduled executor builder.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if name is null or an empty string.

    • threadType

      public EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder threadType(ThreadType type)
      Sets scheduled executor thread type.
      Parameters:
      type - thread type.
      Returns:
      this scheduled executor builder.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if type is null.

    • priority

      public EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder priority(int priority)
      Sets the thread priority. Must be ≥ Thread.MIN_PRIORITY and ≤ Thread.MAX_PRIORITY. If not set, then defaults to Thread.NORM_PRIORITY.
      Parameters:
      priority - assigned thread priority for scheduled executor thread.
      Returns:
      this scheduled executor builder.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if priority < Threads.MIN_PRIORITY or > Thread.MAX_PRIORITY.

    • spinLimit

      public EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder spinLimit(long limit)
      Sets ThreadType.SPINPARK or ThreadType.SPINYIELD spin limit. This setting is ignored for any other scheduled executor thread type.
      Parameters:
      limit - spin limit.
      Returns:
      this scheduled executor builder.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if limit ≤ zero.

    • parkTime

      public EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder parkTime(Duration time)
      Sets spin+park park time limit. This setting is ignored for any other scheduled executor thread type.
      Parameters:
      time - park time limit.
      Returns:
      this scheduled executor builder.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if time is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if time is ≤ zero.

    • threadAffinity

      public EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder threadAffinity(@Nullable ThreadAffinityConfig affinity)
      Sets optional thread affinity to the given configuration list. Thread affinity should be considered when using spinning thread type.
      Parameters:
      affinity - thread affinity configuration.
      Returns:
      this scheduled executor builder.

    • set

      public EfsScheduledExecutor.Builder set(EfsScheduledExecutorConfig config)
      Configures this efs scheduled executor builder as per given configuration.
      Parameters:
      config - efs scheduled executor configuration.
      Returns:
      this scheduled executor builder.

    • build

      public EfsScheduledExecutor build()
      Returns efs scheduled executor based on builder's current settings.
      Returns:
      new efs scheduled executor instance.
      Throws:
      net.sf.eBus.util.ValidationException - if this Builder instance contains incomplete or invalid settings.
